results.content:
Great INTRO to WordPress plugins! This brief 1-hour course showed me just enough to start imagining everything else I could create with a custom plugin, and how some of the pieces fit together. I would recommend this course primarily for coders who are already familiar with the WordPress CMS; newbies might not yet be able to appreciate this course.

I think this course is perfect for developers who already have experience with/understanding of WordPress front- and back-end, and want a QUICK walkthrough on how to write plugins for custom functionality. 

NOTES: 
- I have 2+ years experience in: WP front-end dev, vanilla PHP, and JS front- and back-end dev.
- The example/assignment in this course is very simple; it's just to get your feet wet, not to become an expert.
- If you are a WP beginner, then maybe you choose a broader, more in-depth course to help you understand WordPress and PHP.
- Also, can we give it up for this guy's accent? I've never loved listening to a French/Canadian accent this much. Merci, monsieur.

I think this course is perfect for developers who already have experience with/understanding of WordPress front- and back-end, and want a QUICK walkthrough on how to write plugins for custom functionality.

NOTES:

- Also, can we give it up for this guy's accent? I've never loved listening to a French/Canadian accent this much. Merci, monsieur.

results.content: Great course. Straight to the point. This course helped me to understand the basics of plugins and to use the example as a starting point to my plugin. You will learn basics of jquery, bootstrap, including js in wordpress. Worth it !!!

response.content: Hello Cristiana, thank you so much, your commentary is so warmful ! Best, Guillaume
response.content_html: Hello Cristiana, thank you so much, your commentary is so warmful ! Best, Guillaume

results.content_html: Great course. Straight to the point. This course helped me to understand the basics of plugins and to use the example as a starting point to my plugin. You will learn basics of jquery, bootstrap, including js in wordpress. Worth it !!!

results.content: This is a good quickie course to set up an alert, providing one hasn't already accepted or rejected the cookie (if statement), using jQuery and making it into a WordPress plugin. Of course, since it's less than an hour long, this course won't teach you how to be a master at WordPress plugin development, but it does give you an idea of how it's done in a very simplified way.
results.content_html: This is a good quickie course to set up an alert, providing one hasn't already accepted or rejected the cookie (if statement), using jQuery and making it into a WordPress plugin. Of course, since it's less than an hour long, this course won't teach you how to be a master at WordPress plugin development, but it does give you an idea of how it's done in a very simplified way.
